thread.title: BRIEF-Regal Beloit Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.15

title: BRIEF-Regal Beloit Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.15
text:
10 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Regal Beloit Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.15 Reuters Staff 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Regal Beloit Corp: * ORATION ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.19 TO $5.59 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.14 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.15 * Q4 SALES ROSE 8.3 PERCENT TO $820.7 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.35 TO $5.75 
* SAYS IN 2018, FORECASTING ANOTHER YEAR OF LOW TO MID-SINGLE DIGIT ORGANIC SALES GROWTH 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.35 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.13, REVENUE VIEW $794.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
